Change TV channel.source_sub_task: 2. Turn on the TV using the remote control.
functions:
def has_switch_remote_1(remote:item):
    # Determine whether this remote has a switch
    symbol switch_exists=is_remote_control(remote) and has_switch(remote)
    return switch_exists

behavior sit_on_couch(couch:item):
    body:
        achieve on_char(char, couch) # Sit on the couch
